resources.string: · For a good experience, this version must complete the login
· The cloud account is encrypted \nand saved, and switching devices \ndoes not require repeated login.
· Download videos with higher definition and higher bit rate
· Enjoy the video and picture quality of large member rights (if you have one)
· Download the opera and import it into Bilibili \nto realize offline playback with bullet screen.
· Bilibili account and community related agreements
· 𝘉𝘐𝘓𝘐𝘉𝘐𝘓𝘐𝘈𝘚 𝘜𝘴𝘦𝘳 𝘈𝘨𝘳𝘦𝘦𝘮𝘦𝘯𝘵 and 𝘉𝘐𝘓𝘐𝘉𝘐𝘓𝘐𝘈𝘚 𝘗𝘳𝘪𝘷𝘢𝘤𝘺 𝘈𝘨𝘳𝘦𝘦𝘮𝘦𝘯𝘵
